title: Added "User Groups" to the User's Permissions tab to make it easier to manage user permissions for admins.
Administrators can now copy "classic" approval rules, system review rules, and create rights.
Administrators can now see idle time for users in the session manager.
Fixed concurrency issues in pop-up task form that occassionally caused changes to be lost.
Administrators will now see if a user is active in a role on the User's Permissions tab
New Formula Functions for Document Links and Custom Tables.
Filtering by Document ID now works again on the Browse screen
Entering a month & day (i.e. "Jul 7") in a date field now defaults to the current year instead of 2001.
